product_overview: FrogFace RPG is a web-based gamified productivity system integrating RPG mechanics, a Pomodoro timer, and Todo task management, enhanced with revolutionary voice integration via ChatGPT and Model Context Protocol (MCP) for automated quest creation from voice commands. It motivates users through real-money rewards, progress tracking, and AI coaching.
core_goals: Transform personal development and productivity into an engaging RPG-style game.
Integrate voice-to-quest functionality using ChatGPT MCP for automatic task extraction and project detection.
Provide a motivating reward system with real money payouts for task completion and milestones.
Offer a comprehensive Todo system with task prioritization, streaks, and daily bonuses.
Track life stats (Energy, Mind, Power, Social, Pro) and visualize progress with interactive charts.
Incorporate an AI Game Master for adaptive quests, personalized coaching, and motivation.
Enable social sharing with customizable achievement and progress cards.
Ensure seamless client-side persistence through LocalStorage for offline availability.
key_features: DetoxRPG game system managing RPG mechanics, streaks, and rewards.
Pomodoro timer with customizable work/break sessions, sound controls, and automatic boost completion.
Todo task management with creation, completion, deletion, priority-based reward calculation, and daily streak bonuses.
Life stats tracking and visualization: Energy, Mind, Power, Social, Pro stats with color-coded feedback.
Achievement system with 9 unique achievements and level progression based on XP earned.
ChatGPT MCP server integration enabling voice-to-quest feature with AI-powered task extraction, priority and emotional state detection.
Smart project detection categorizing tasks into Edison, Receptor, FrogFace, and Personal projects.
Reward scaling and customization allowing users to set budgets and adjust reward values dynamically.
40+ activity boosts across multiple categories with search, filtering and custom boost creation capabilities.
Dark-themed RPG UI design with animations, modals, responsive layout, and modern fonts and icons.
Statistics visualization using Chart.js including daily history, progress bars, and graphical summaries.
Built-in sharing system generating PNG cards for achievements, streaks, goals, and daily summaries.
Comprehensive goal saving and tracking system with pre-set and custom financial targets.
LocalStorage-based persistent data storage with auto-save and session recovery.
System reset options for soft and full progress clearing with confirmation dialogs.
user_flow_summary: User opens the FrogFace RPG web app on any device and reviews the rules via the help modal.
User selects or switches challenge types and customizes reward settings according to personal budget.
User adds new tasks manually or by speaking into ChatGPT voice which, via MCP server, auto-creates quests in the RPG.
User activates daily boosts by selecting activities or completing Pomodoro focus sessions that automatically register boosts.
User completes tasks, marks clean days, or logs relapses; the app calculates rewards and updates streaks accordingly.
The AI Game Master provides personalized daily quests and contextual advice tailored to user's current stats and progress.
User tracks life stats and visual progress on dash board and charts, engages with achievements and levels up.
User generates and shares social cards highlighting accomplishments while configuring privacy regarding reward visibility.
User's game state and progress persist locally, allowing continuation across sessions with options to reset or export data.
validation_criteria: All core RPG mechanics correctly track streaks, rewards, and life stats with UI feedback.
Voice integration must accurately convert spoken plans into actionable quests with at least 80% task extraction accuracy.
Pomodoro timer respects configured durations, triggers sound notifications, and auto-completes focus boost rewards after 4 sessions.
Task creation, toggling, and deletion update reward pools and streaks in real-time without data loss.
Achievement unlocking and level progression reflect correctly with animated notifications and reward calculation.
Boost management, including custom boosts creation, search, filtering, and auto-scaling of rewards, functions as expected.
Chart.js visualizations show correct and current progress data with responsive rendering.
Social sharing cards generate correctly in chosen styles with options to hide monetary sums and export as PNG or clipboard copy.
All user data persists in localStorage with autosave, session recovery, and consistent state after reloads.
Reset actions prompt confirmation modals and correctly clear or preserve data as intended.
UI is responsive and accessible across devices with proper use of Tailwind CSS, icons, fonts, and animations.
Backend MCP server reliably interfaces with ChatGPT Desktop App for voice input, task extraction, and project classification.
